name: On a Roll (itch) (CyberThreat)
description:
Made for GMTK Game Jam 2022
Theme: Roll of the Dice

Control a die around 3 various puzzles in 3 different game modes, including:

  • Reach The Target
    • Get to the flag at the end of the course
  • Paint The Tiles
    • Touch all of the tiles to switch their color
  • Collect The Coins
    • Touch all of the tiles to switch their color

Control the die by clicking the buttons to move in the direction shown. The amount of steps taken matches the value on the top of the die.

Dress up your die! There are multiple customization options to make you the handsomest die around, including:

  • Fancy Dice
  • Gamer Dice
  • Cool Dice

And more!

Featuring music from CyberThreat's soundtrack, "Jinghi" & "Cybercraf" composed by Kyle Misko.

Notes:

  • Known bugs in Windows build:
    • Inconsistent Win screens for Paint The Tiles and Collect the Coins
    • Retry bugs causing the die to appear in incorrect places
    • Sometimes continuing to move when off the stage, should just fall straight away
    • Coins don't reappear on retry in Collect the Coins, have to exit to menu and start the level again to make them reappear.

Please comment any others you come across!
